_sText:
Map Name: gg_mr_grande

Version: 1.0

Created By: Paul '[MalReynolds]' Elliott

Email: whde2000@yahoo.co.uk

Dev Notes: gg_mr_guard is a re-imagining of the famous kk_arena. This is infact my second design based on that map and this is the one i feel best portrays my work. The original map always brought a problem on the servers because the Spawns we're raised and there was no way to get back into them once you'd left. Spawn Campers had a pretty easy time picking people off at the back and other players could only attack directly in their line of sight. To combat this i've altered the height and added a staircase to the side. Using the custom dev textures as well the curving techniques i use, i'm proud of the outcome and hope others enjoy playing on it.

Dev textures from FPSBanana http://www.fpsbanana.com/ by Chris528. Thanks for the textures.
Based on kk_arena.

Custom Textures added with Pakrat.

Spawn Points: 36
